English |website = |issn = 1554-9151 }} 'Links' (also known as 'Links Magazine',
or 'Links: The Best of Golf ' in full) is a U.S. bi-
monthly golf magazine published by Purcell Enterprises, Inc. in Hilton Head
Island, South Carolina. Links has a mission "of bringing the most engaging,
sophisticated and surprising content to its audience of passionate golfers." {{Cite web
  | last = first = authorlink = coauthors = title = The History of LINKS
  | Magazine work = Links: The Best of Golf publisher = Purcell Enterprises,
  | Inc. year = 2008 url =

  | format = doi = accessdate = 13 July 2010}}
